borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Fells: Tree number - T1 Tree type - Sycamore (Acer psuedoplatanus) Approx Height - 9m Approx Spread - 3m Location - Rear garden Rear boundary left hand corner - Service - FellWork required- Dismantle tree as close to tree's current ground level as possible and leave the stump in the ground, Treat stump with one application of glyphosate only to best endeavour the prevention of regrowth. Reason - to clear area as garden, very overgrown and so resident can make use of garden.Tree number - G1 Tree type - various small shrubs/weeds/vines Approx Height - various heights Location - Whole Rear garden  Service - Fell Work required- Fell all shrubs/weeds in the entire garden as close to tree's current ground level as possible and leave the stumps in the ground. Treat stumps with one application of glyphosate only to best endeavour the prevention of regrowth. Cut back to boundary all neighbouring trees/shrubs/vines which overhangs the garden. Reason - to clear area as garden very overgrown and so resident can make use of garden.
